text.section: If a claim against the Fund alleges that the act or omission giving rise to the claim was performed by a licensee, the Board may join the proceeding on the claim with any disciplinary proceeding against the licensee under this title arising from the same facts alleged in the claim.

section.section:
For that part of a hearing on consolidated proceedings that relates to disciplinary action but does not relate to the Fund claim against a licensee, the claimant:
May not be a party; and
May participate only as a witness.
For that part of a hearing on consolidated proceedings that relates to the claim against the Fund, the claimant is a party.
